Plot: The Department of Scientific Intelligence (aka "The Shop") never anticipated that two participants in their research program would marry and have a child. Charlie McGee inherited pyrokinetic powers from her parents, who had been given a low-grade hallucinogen called "Lot Six" while at college. Now the government is trying to capture young Charlie and harness her powerful firestarting skills as a weapon. --stephenking.com
Characters: Charlene "Charlie" McGee, Andrew "Andy" McGee, John Rainbird, Captain James "Cap" Hollester, Vicky Tomlinson, Patrick Hockstetter, Irv Manders, Norma Manders, Doctor Joseph Wanless, Doctor Herman Pynchot, Albert Steinowitz, Orv "OJ" Jamieson, Orville Bates
Setting: United States of America, Albany, New York (United States), New York City, New York (United States), Virginia (United States) Bradford, Vermont (United States) Harrison, Ohio (United States), Virginia (United States), Bradford, Vermont (United States), Harrison, Ohio (United States)
